amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to carry out a national media campaign promoting alternative green technologies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for a green energy national media campaign.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A068) offered by Mr. Walberg.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
